Html:
I'm trying to use the sample "SizeDefinition" in my own project. I have defined a CommandName = "buttonNavigation" and so on. Then I create my own sizeDefinition, similar to the sample.

Unluckily I got the following failure.

CommandName 'buttonNavigation' referenced by two or more incompatible controls.

I only defined it once and used in the view once.

Thanks for helping me.

 

regards
I've fixed it right now. The reason is that I have given one Id to two different commands.
